1123820.name: Spark Circuits VR
1123820.description:
Spark Circuits is a touch-and-spark VR narrative adventure through the futuristic depths of a robot family’s home. Overcome room puzzles and challenges by short circuiting the invasive robots while being mindful to not short circuit your helpful best robot friend or his little robot sister.

Featuring:
  • Full English voice acting
  • Optional subtitles
  • Useful Save Spots
  • Three VR movement systems to choose from, slide, grapple teleport and/or arm swing
  • A mini-plunger grapple for grabbing all those important items

Spark Circuits VR – Now you’re sparkin' with power!
1123820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
